name: How to Start Making Money Blogging
name_original: How to Start Making Money Blogging
description:
A game created in 2 days for Random Wikihow Jam, based on the random WikiHow article How to Start Making Money Blogging. Type to blog, unlock upgrades, and earn your fortune. Featuring beautiful art made in MS Paint and random clickbait headlines generated with Tracery.

Special thanks to Sally Juettner for contributing much of the clickbait headline content.
